full_text: From: (b)(6) (b)(7)(C) (Reuters)" +(b)(6) (b)(7)(C) @thomsonreuters.com> To: (b)(6) @bop.gov" <(b)(6) @bop.gov> Subject: Jeffrey Epstein Sent: Sat, 10 Aug 2019 13:47:02 +0000 Hello Lee, I am a reporter with Reuters and am reaching out to seek to confirm that Jeffrey Epstein died of suicide at your facility. If this is true can you say approximately when he died and how he committed suicide? I can be reached at (646) 200(b)(6) Thanks, Alex (b)(6) (b)(7)(C) Journalist | Thomson Reuters Los Angeles Bureau Mobile: (+1) 646-200-(b)(6) Follow me online at: @AdobReports

text_blocks.content: From: (b)(6) (b)(7)(C) (Reuters)" +(b)(6) (b)(7)(C) @thomsonreuters.com> To: (b)(6) @bop.gov" <(b)(6) @bop.gov> Subject: Jeffrey Epstein Sent: Sat, 10 Aug 2019 13:47:02 +0000

Hello Lee, I am a reporter with Reuters and am reaching out to seek to confirm that Jeffrey Epstein died of suicide at your facility. If this is true can you say approximately when he died and how he committed suicide? I can be reached at (646) 200(b)(6) Thanks, Alex
(b)(6) (b)(7)(C) Journalist | Thomson Reuters Los Angeles Bureau Mobile: (+1) 646-200-(b)(6) Follow me online at: @AdobReports

additional_notes: The document contains redactions marked as (b)(6) and (b)(7)(C), indicating potentially sensitive information.
